cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Lijing has indestructible as long as a Fox entered the battlefield under your control this turn.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, draw a card unless that player has you create a 2/1 red and white Fox creature token.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Each player may draw a card. For each opponent who does, you gain 4 life.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent. That card’s owner may pay {2} as a sorcery to put it into their hand as long as it remains exiled.
[-8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Creatures you control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.”

Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
[+1]: Scry 1. If you’re in a renaissance, draw a card.
[-2]: Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand if its mana value is 3 or less or if you’re in a renaissance.
[-6]: Create two 8/8 blue Kraken creature tokens. If you’re in a renaissance, take an extra turn after this one.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Panya attacks, you may put an escapade counter on her, then you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand with mana value equal to the number of escapade counters on Panya without paying its mana cost.
{1}{U}: Panya gains flying until end of turn.

cards.card_name: Lizhao, Last Breath of the Yenzu
cards.rules_text:
Flying, lifelink
Other Demons you control have flying and lifelink.
If you would create a creature token, you may pay 5 life to create a 5/5 black Demon creature token instead.

When Forbidden Shiangshi Arts enters the battlefield, each player mills three cards.
{2}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a tapped token that’s a copy of that card, except it has “When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it.”

Flying
Whenever Hao’Tai deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top five cards of their library and separates them into two piles. Put an ember counter on each card in the pile of your choice. You may play cards from exile with ember counters for as long as they remain exiled.

Entropic Inferno deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. At the beginning of the next end step, for each permanent dealt damage this way, its owner puts it on the bottom of their library, then reveals cards from the top until they reveal a nonland permanent card. They put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest.

Trample
Qiyan enters the battlefield with twice X +1/+1 counters on them.
If damage would be dealt to Qiyan while they have a +1/+1 counter on them, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Qiyan, and create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

When Foster the Future enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 red Panda creature token.
Panda creatures and Mao planeswalkers you control have “[+2]: Target creature you control gains vigilance until end of turn” and “[-4]: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.”

Golden age
{2}{G}{W}: Create an Idol token. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature this turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you’re in a renaissance and you control ten or more Idols, you win the game.

cards.card_name: Wang Xi, Wishes on the Wind
cards.rules_text:
Flying, ward {3}
[i]Inspired[/i] — Whenever Wang Xi becomes untapped, choose a nonbasic card name, then reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

First strike
Whenever Ren deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 3 life to activate one of her abilities without paying its costs.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent sacrifices a creature.

Golden age
Gui can’t attack or block unless you’re in a renaissance.
{T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it back on top or into your graveyard and you gain 3 life.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Each opponent discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.
[-2]: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
[-6]: Each opponent chooses up to one permanent they control of each permanent type, then sacrifices the rest.

[0]: Create a 2/2 green Panda Bear Monk creature token with “When this creature dies, put a loyalty counter on a Ji planeswalker you control.”
[-2]: Each player sacrifices a nonland permanent. You may return a nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a permanent you control dies, you may search you library for a card that shares a type with that permanent and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.”

[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token. Put a menace counter on it.
[-2]: Draw a card for each tapped creature you control.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Creature cards in your hand have ‘{1}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to its owner’s hand: Put this card onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.’”

[+1]: Create three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. They gain haste.
[0]: Until end of turn, each creature and planeswalker you control becomes a 3/3 Warrior creature and gains indestructible.
[-2]: Choose tapped or untapped. Seto San deals 3 damage to each creature with the chosen attribute.

cards.rules_text:
Distribute four +1/+1 counters among up to two target lands you control. Those lands become 0/0 Elemental creatures with haste until end of turn. If you’re attacking, tap those lands and they’re now attacking.
Showcase {3}{R}{G}

Flying, haste
Whenever Ma’Long deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then add that much mana in any combination of {U} and {R}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Instant and sorcery cards in your hand have showcase. The showcase cost is equal to the card’s mana cost plus {2}.
cards.special_text2:
[+1]: Boxue deals 1 damage to each opponent. You may draw a card, then discard a card.
[-1]: Create a Treasure token.
[-5]: Copy the next spell you cast this turn. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copied permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink
Whenever one or more other creatures with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If your life total is greater than your starting life total, draw a card instead. This ability triggers only once each turn.

First strike
Noncreature spells with mana value 3 or greater cost {1} more to cast.
Creatures with mana value 3 or greater enter the battlefield tapped.

Flying
When Yujei enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
{2}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains flying until end of turn. If it already has flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Yujei instead.

Vigilance
When Cai Lan enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less. Its controller creates an Idol token.

Equipped creature has double strike.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, create an Idol token.
Abilities of Idols you control that target equipped creature cost {1} less to activate.
Equip {2}{W}

When Diao enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
Whenever Diao attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control with the least power among those creatures.

Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
If you’re in a renaissance, you may have target creature or planeswalker gain indestructible until end of turn.
Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers.

cards.special_text:
[i](Choose only one work as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
When Chronicles of the Kitsune enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 red and white Fox creature token.
{2}{W}: [i]Act I: Ascent[/i]
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have flying.
{3}{W}{W}: [i]Act II: Descent[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you control no creatures, create Hu Li, a legendary 4/4 white Fox Spirit creature token with flying and lifelink.

cards.rules_text: Put a porcelain counter on each of up to one target creature and up to one target artifact. They become 3/3 colorless artifact creatures and lose all abilities.

Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, if you’re in a renaissance, each opponent sacrifices a creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, create an Idol token.
Whenever you put a +1/+1 counter on Ya’Ling, put a +1/+1 on each other creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Vigilance, trample
Pay 3 life: You choose how target creature attacks or blocks this turn. Activate only once each turn.

Flash
Flying
When Oshin enters the battlefield, counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of spells you’ve cast this turn.
Whenever Chian becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
When Ushi Yun enters the battlefield, create an Idol token.
As long as you’re in a renaissance, artifacts you control have “{T}: Draw a card.”

You may have Sun Yun enter the battlefield as as copy of any creature on the battlefield, except her name is Sun Yun, Master of Man, she’s legendary in addition to her other types, and she has “{2}{U}: Exile Sun Yun, then return her to the battlefield under her owner’s control.”

{T}: Gain control of target creature or planeswalker with mana value less than or equal to Kan’Gi’s power for as long as you control her.
[i]Inspired[/i] — Whenever Kan’Gi becomes untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on her.

Draw a card. If this is the third spell you’ve cast this turn, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying. If this is the sixth spell you’ve cast this turn, exile it, then return up to three target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand and untap up to six lands.

Exile target creature. If you controlled that creature, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. Otherwise, its controller creates a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
Showcase {4}{U} [i](Then if you cast this for its showcase cost, create a 1/1 red Bard creature token that can’t block and exile this. When that token attacks, you may cast a free copy of this.)[/i]

cards.special_text:

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{6}{U}{U}: [i]Eye of Shojiro[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token, then exile the top card of that player’s library. You may play cards exiled this way for as long as they remain exiled.

Dance of Dragons deals 4 damage divided as you choose among up to two targets. The first time one or more permanents dealt damage this way die this turn, draw a card.
Showcase {5}{U}{R} [i](Then if you cast this for its showcase cost, create a 1/1 red Bard creature token that can’t block and exile this. When that token attacks, you may cast a free copy of this.)[/i]

Flash
Flying
When Fang Luo enters the battlefield, exile target spell or creature an opponent controls with mana value 4 or less, then its owner puts it onto the battlefield face down. [i](It’s a 2/2 creature.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Oshu deals combat damage to a player, gain control of target land that player controls. It becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature that’s still a land.
As long as you control eight or more lands, Oshu and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Tzelin.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Tzelin: Each opponent loses life equal to Tzelin’s power. If you’re in a renaissance, draw that many cards.

Discard a card: Ha’Eng gains deathtouch until end of turn.
[i]Inspired[/i] — Whenever Ha’Eng becomes untapped, look at the top card of your library and exile it face down. Then you may pay 3 life to put all cards exiled with Ha’Eng into your hand.

Flying, trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, an opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do, you may sacrifice a creature to repeat this process. If you don’t, tap Kai’Jun.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
You may cast black spells with mana value 3 or less by paying life equal to their mana values rather than paying their mana costs.

Until end of turn, target creature you control gains “{T}: Destroy target creature.”

cards.special_text:

{2}{B}: [i]Finale: Alone[/i]
Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses life equal to its power and you gain that much life.
